channel.title: VB6 - .wma
channel.description: Does anyone know a class that can read .wma tags (all versions) in visual basic 6?

item.title: VB6 - .wma
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Search google for the .wma format structure and then manually write the decoder. This would be the best way as you would understand the format as well as develop your understanding of file formats. However if this isnâ€™t something you want to do, I had a little search and i found this. http://www.codeproject.com/KB/files/tagreader.aspx . I dont know if this actually works as I literally just found the site, but if I were you i would just write the decode method myself.

Read full topic
